channel.title: CVE Feed for AyeCode Ltd -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AyeCode Ltd -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-29453|2024-09-16T17:57:52.647Z -- ayecode%20ltd -- api%20key%20for%20google%20maps
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in API KEY for Google Maps plugin <= 1.2.1 at WordPress leading to Google Maps API key update.

item.title: CVE-2024-43145|2024-08-19T16:09:53.899Z -- ayecode%20ltd -- geodirectory
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in AyeCode Ltd GeoDirectory.This issue affects GeoDirectory: from n/a through 2.3.61.

item.title: CVE-2024-31936|2024-07-03T13:18:45.233Z -- ayecode%20ltd -- userswp
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in AyeCode Ltd UsersWP.This issue affects UsersWP: from n/a before 1.2.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-31936|2024-04-11T12:15:46.696Z -- ayecode%20ltd -- userswp
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in AyeCode Ltd UsersWP.This issue affects UsersWP: from n/a before 1.2.6.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in AyeCode Ltd UsersWP.This issue affects UsersWP: from n/a before 1.2.6.
